snippet.title: Qld police charge third over shooting
snippet.content: Police have charged a third person with attempted murder after a 20-year-old man was shot in the stomach and leg in the Queensland city of Toowoomba. The 25-year-old man will front court on August 14 over the alleged attack at Rangeville in the early hours of July 19. Police charged a 26-year-old woman on Tuesday, while a 23-year-old man fronted court the day after the shooting. (C) AAP 2017
